name: Eagles’ Wings Flight Training
about: Eagles’ Wings Flight Training, located in Lewisburg, West Virginia, has been training pilots since 1984 at Greenbrier Valley Airport and Hinton-Alderson Airport. Led by instructor David H. Hersman, who has provided over 6,300 hours of instruction, the school offers a range of programs including private pilot, instrument, sport pilot, and tailwheel training. Utilizing primarily the Cessna 150, students gain valuable experience in a controlled airport environment with minimal delays. The school is affiliated with Eagles´ Wings Aviation Ministry and Eagles´ Wings Christian Academy in Papua New Guinea. With a focus on safe flying practices and extensive flying knowledge, Eagles’ Wings Flight Training has helped numerous students achieve their pilot licenses and fulfill lifelong dreams of flying. Whether you are a young enthusiast or an older individual, Eagles’ Wings Flight Training is dedicated to making your flying experience both enjoyable and educational.
